name: Tank Force
description: Tank Force - the coolest free online tank shooter This is a new word in online tank battles, which combines the best qualities of a tank simulator and thrilling arcade battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.0, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card with 256 MB RAM Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Storage: 3 GB available space
